EmailTemplate.name: Version5 Training.Last Minute Notes - Dallas
EmailTemplate.subject: TriTech Training - Last minute notes and helpful hints
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> VisiCAD 5.2 Training Complimentary regional training - Tomorrow Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Just a few notes about tomorrow's training.
Start Time: 9 AM
Room Location: The meeting room is L1FN - which is lower level, on the west side of the City Hall (near the flag side of City Hall)
Parking: There is no free parking. There are meters on the south side of City Hall or cash only parking lots on the south side of City Hall.
Address: 1500 Marilla St.; Dallas, TX 75201 Click here to view map <http://g.co/maps/8q3cu>
Looking forward to seeing you!
Question? Gladys Ferguson, Training Supervisor TriTech Software Systems (858) 799-7383 gladys.ferguson@tritech.com
